actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study and investigation with respect to the adoption by the United States of a reformed calendar.

summary.text: Provides for a study and investigation by the Secretary of Commerce of the adoption by the United States of a reformed calendar, and requires the Secretary to report to the Congress on such study and investigation on or before June 30, 1976. Authorizes to be appropriated $100,000 to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study and investigation with respect to the adoption by the United States of a reformed calendar.
